question: i am from Iran . My English is  not  very well but i want to say something  that is really important for all diabetics around the world. My uncle have diabetes 23 years and he had very bad leg ulcer which every doctors who we visit them just ordered  to cut his foot.my uncle had a good experience about herbal medicines and  it was hard to believe but he could make a herbal medicines to cure his foot completely after 2 month . after that he tried it on 12 other legs which had different situations and now they are as healthy as a normal leg . we just want help to make known it to the people around the world . you can test it on each diabetic ulcer that u want , look the result then help to spread it around the world.please trust us we are ready to do what u say.thanks  a lot  because of your attention .
title: a reliable way to cure diabetic leg ulcer
